name: Movie Theater Floor
author: ASCHILZ
summary: This snack mix is a salty-sweet combination of everything you might find on the floor of a movie theater. I got this recipe from a co-worker and it is delicious!
ingredients: ½ (10.5 ounce) bag corn chips (such as Fritos®)
1 cup jelly beans or other small candies, or as desired
directions: Mix popcorn, corn chips, candy corn, mixed nuts, and jelly beans together in a large bowl
In a microwave-safe glass bowl, melt the white chocolate chips on Low setting until barely melted, 1 or 2 minutes
Pour the white chocolate over the popcorn mixture, and stir to coat
Allow to cool, and break apart into small pieces
